title: Winding up of the National Agency for Public Private Partnership
decision_details:
- The National Agency for Public Private Partnership operates as a unit of the Ministry of Finance with an Advisory Board comprising of the Secretary to the Treasury and other Officials with a cadre of 20 personnel, in accordance with a Cabinet decision taken in the year 2017.

	It has been identified that there is no necessity to maintain this unit any longer since the Government is taking action to streamline its activities and consolidate functions. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Finance, Economy and Policy Development to authorize the Secretary to the Treasury to undertake the winding up procedures of the said unit, was approved by the Cabinet.
